name: Footballer Of The Year - The Ultimate Social Football Game!
blurb: White Room Games & Flaming Pumpkin are creating the ultimate social football (Soccer) game experience. Coming soon to mobile & tablets

name: White Room Games Ltd / Flaming Pumpkin

rewards.reward: Sunday League Hotshot:\r\n\r\n\u2022 By supporting the game you will receive our eternal gratitude \u2022 Plus your name will be featured on our website backers list!

Youth Team Star: \r\n\r\n\u2022 You will receive 50 in-game goal cards, which can be used to boost your scoring chances and improve your footie skills in the final game \u2022 Plus you will also get access to our exclusive backer forum \u2022 Footballer Of The Year's official Twitter feed @FOTYgame will follow you on Twitter \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Rising Star:\r\n\r\n\u2022 You will receive exclusive wallpaper backgrounds for your mobile device or desktop \u2022 You will receive a detailed copy of the design document for Footballer Of The Year in PDF format which will give you an amazing insight into design process of the game \u2022 In addition you will have the opportunity to beta test the game before it is released with the option to give us feedback on what you like / dislike, what works, what doesn't etc \u2022 You will receive a further 50 in-game goal cards to use in game \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

First Team Player: \u2022 You will receive an exclusive A2 Footballer Of The Year poster \u2022 A limited edition Footballer Of The Year backer badge \u2022 You will also get a name check in the official match day program \u2022 Plus an additional 50 goal cards to use in game \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Seasoned Pro: \u2022**PUT YOUR TEAM IN OUR GAME** We will include your Sunday League, Pub Team, School or University Team.  Not only will your team be in the game with the correct team colors we will also ensure that it will be in all future versions of the game \u2022 You will be rewarded with an backers in-game achievement in the final version of the game that only kickstarter backers can receive \u2022 You will receive one of our stylish Footballer Of The Year caricature player cards and one of our exclusive Footballer Of The Year backers winning medals \u2022 Plus an additional 50 goal cards to use in game \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

International Top Top Player: \u2022 Exclusive Footballer Of The Year T-Shirt \u2022 2013/14 Footballer Of The Year Z-Card Fixture List \u2022 Your name will appear in the in-game Credits \u2022 A full set of six Footballer Of The year caricature player cards \u2022 Plus an additional 50 goal cards to use in game \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

World Class: \u2022 You will receive a printed copy of the official Footballer Of The Year match day program \u2022 Our amazing artists will create a personal caricature card of you which will be provided both printed and digitally \u2022 An in game personalised advert on the in game advertising hoarding we will also ensure that it will be in all future versions of the game \u2022 In game naming rights to a lifestyle item that can be purchased in the game we will also ensure that it will be in all future versions of the game \u2022 A limited edition set of concept art for the game in digital format \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Football Legend: \u2022 Naming rights to an in game stadium we will also ensure that it will be in all future versions of the game \u2022 An official and extremely limited Footballer Of The Year football shirt \u2022 You receive an engraved official Footballer Of The Year Trophy * On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Ultimate Footballer Of The Year: \u2022 The team will design a player based on you and include it in the final version of the game for all to play as / against \u2022 We will feature you the official Footballer Of The Year match day program \u2022 The opportunity to meet the team for lunch / dinner in Birmingham, UK (sorry we cannot cover travel / accommodation) \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Manager Office: \u2022 Name a Football in the game \u2022 Name a pair of Football Boots in the game \u2022 Name an energy item in the game \u2022 Name a luxury item in the game \u2022 Name a specific skill in the game \u2022 Two page feature in the official Footballer Of The Year match day program \u2022 **We will also ensure that all of the above will be in future versions of the game** \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Directors Box: \u2022 Name a cup competition in the game \u2022 News Flash name as a reporter in the game \u2022 Name on players locker in the game \u2022 Message on electronic ticker tape summary screen in the game \u2022 Name in post match advertising area in the game \u2022 Message on electronic bill boards behind the goal in the game \u2022 Advert in the official Footballer Of The Year match day program \u2022 **We will also ensure that all of the above will be in future versions of the game** \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.

Chairmans Lounge: \u2022 Name a league in the game \u2022 Name in the title screen in the game \u2022 Sponsored goals in the game \u2022 Name achievements in the game \u2022 Half Time advertising in the game \u2022 Name in the corner and goal view hoarding in the game \u2022 Four page feature and double page advert in the official Footballer Of The Year match day program \u2022\u2022 **We will also ensure that all of the above will be in future versions of the game** \u2022 On top of these great items you will receive all of the above rewards.
